channel.title: Need help with virus removal
channel.description:
Ok guys, I have a virus called "XP Security Center". I have been researching on how to get rid of it, but it seems like none of the files they tell me to remove can be found on my computer. I am stuck. I have no internet acces but I can put files onto it with a flash drive. I need your alls help on how to get rid of this virus. I will take any ideas. PLEASE HELP ME!!
THANKS!

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ye i was using internet explorer because when i use google chrome I kept getting all of these pop ups and ads. Like if I searched something in google and then clicked the link an add would come up instead of the website I wanted.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just for the record, you got this because you didn’t keep your windows updated and you were browsing the web with internet explorer or an old version of firefox. Don’t make the mistake of that again!

I had the same “xp security center” rogue antivirus software, and deleted it using mbam.

Worst comes to worst, you can always recover your files using an ubuntu livecd.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I have two on my desktop but when i click them they dont install…Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ok i did what you said Vain,but I dont know what I do after I do all of your instructions. Like where do I download the antimalware stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

AVG.com

Virenschutz kostenlos herunterladen | AVG AntiVirus FREE

Das Antivirenprogramm AVG AntiVirus FREE schützt PC, Mac und Smartphone vor Viren und Malware. Einfach zu nutzen. Virenschutz kostenlos. Jetzt herunterladen!

This should get rid of it, although your going to need to dig around for an offline installer. Also, no internet access? Sounds like someone made a retarded move on making a virus.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with virus removal
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Re install the OS.
